subject: Boxing
Missing Persons
lead_paragraph: Two Cuban boxers who disappeared during last month’s Pan American Games were found at a resort near Rio de Janeiro, where the police say they caroused and ran up an exorbitant tab. Now, a police inspector said, they want to go back to Cuba. The two-time Olympic champion Guillermo Rigondeaux and Erislandy Lara were found Thursday at an inn in the coastal resort city Cabo Frio.
